statements: SELECT student_name, performance_rating FROM StudentReports;
SELECT * FROM StudentReports WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM StudentReports WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, performance_rating FROM StudentReports ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM StudentReports WHERE performance_rating > 8.5;
SELECT * FROM StudentReports WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT student_name, course_name, performance_rating FROM StudentReports WHERE completion_status = FALSE
SELECT course_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM StudentReports GROUP BY course_id
SELECT course_name FROM StudentReports ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM StudentReports WHERE performance_rating > 4.5 AND completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id > 3 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT course_name, effectiveness_rating FROM CourseEffectiveness WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_date FROM CompletionRates WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_id = 456;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CourseEffectiveness;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT course_id, course_name, effectiveness_rating FROM CourseEffectiveness WHERE effectiveness_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_id, count(*) AS completion_count FROM CompletionRates GROUP BY student_id HAVING completion_count > 2

SELECT StudentPerformance.student_id, StudentPerformance.performance_score, CourseEffectiveness.course_name FROM StudentPerformance JOIN CourseEffectiveness ON StudentPerformance.student_id = CourseEffectiveness.course_id ORDER BY StudentPerformance.performance_score DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_date FROM completions WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 3.5 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, completion_date FROM students s JOIN completions c ON s.student_id = c.student_id WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Course WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_status FROM Enrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Report WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Student ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Course WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, student_id, course_id, grade FROM Report WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC, report_date ASC;
